title: Fire over England
creator_credit: William K. Howard, Erich Pommer, Pendennis and London Film Productions
brief_description: Historical drama dealing with England’s struggle against the Spanish Armada. Performances by Vivien Leigh, Laurence Olivier, Flora Robson and an early performance by James Mason. Based on the novel by A.E.W. Mason.
creator_credit_for_label: William K. Howard, Erich Pommer, Pendennis and London Film Productions
